This is an adult product.  You have been warned.  ;)

The product I ordered was advertised as a bundle deal, as well. Both the picture and the title implied that I would get both the DVD and the game.  I only got the DVD.  I really only cared about the DVD movie, mind you, but the game made the deal more enticing.  I instead looked the game up on YouTube and decided it wasn't worth my time, anyway.  I recommend you only order this based on the assumption that you will get only the DVD movie.

In order to enjoy this show, you have to set aside your intelligence and focus on the sex acts.  Some of the sex scenes are a little too absurd, though, if you think about the scenery.  For example, a girl strips on stage at a student assembly and masturbates.  She isn't stopped by anyone!  I just assume that someone in the assembly would stop her in a real life scenario.  That said, this isn't real life... this is a porn movie above all else, and they simply don't care about plot or immersion.

The animation quality is actually pretty high.  I like the proportions of the girls' bodies above all else.  The emphasis on anatomically correct though very exaggerated and absurdly perfect bodies is what originally drew me to the Bible Black series, and this movie does not disappoint.  However, I must admit that I got more shock value from the original Bible Black.  There was more emphasis on the girls in this movie rather than the leading male character of the original Bible Black, whose name escapes me right now.

Overall, I liked the movie, but it was a little short and some scenes could have better writing.  If you can overlook the flaws, this movie could be great escapism.
shipping was 100% but the movie itself was poorly dubbed. The artwork was up to snuff and gave a good preview for the first bible black
